definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">tooltip_event</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:AdagaAssassinos</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="is_key_pressed"><field name="key">Shift</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="new_tooltip_line_position"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§8— A arma "Adaga dos Assassinos" pertence a classe dos "Assassinos", ela tem a finalidade de ocultar diretamente quem matou o acertado, também irá aprimorar os atributos da habilidade de "Dash"</field></block></value><value name="position"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="new_tooltip_line_position"><value name="tooltiptext"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">§8Segure SHIFT para mais informações</field></block></value><value name="position"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
